text: Hello, I have a question regarding Cloudflare + HubSpot CMS.  We are wanting the Domain proxied through Cloudflare to take advantage of their image resizing feature.  However, when we turn on the proxy, HubSpot shows the domain as "disconnected" and will not validate the DNS records.  Has anyone ran into this?

Question, if Marketing wants to delete or unpublish a page, does HubSpot notify the user of webpages/blog posts linked to that page before deletion? Is there a knowledge article that someone can send me that explains that?
